content:
Now that we are sadly getting to the point where we should all be wearing masks, we should all buy from here: https://shop.spreadshirt.com/HL7-International/accessories+face+coverings?q=P193

Of course, I expect that everyone outside victoria will be thinking 'we're not there yet, if at all', and I predict that will turn out to be a mistake (though I very much hope I'm wrong)
just bought the one with FHIR logo, I believe it's extra protective :slight_smile:

Nice.
Unfortunately they are 2-layer and all cotton. The Vic dept of health suggests 3-layer with a mix of materials
